outcome.title: Structure of an IVP and Verifying Solutions
outcome.description: Identify the structure of an initial value problem and its solution.

outcome.title: Direction Fields
outcome.description: Use technology to generate a direction/slope field for a first-order ODE, and interpret this field to approximate the value of an IVP solution at a point.

outcome.title: Euler's Method
outcome.description: Implement Euler's Method for a first-order IVP to approximate the value of an IVP solution at a point.

outcome.title: Existence/uniqueness IVP Theorems
outcome.description: Apply appropriate theorems to determine the largest possible domain for which an IVP is guaranteed a unique solution.

outcome.title: Constant-Coefficient Linear Homogeneous First-Order IVPs
outcome.description: Find general and particular solutions for constant-coefficient linear homogeneous first-order IVPs.

outcome.title: Constant-Coefficient Linear Non-Homogeneous First-Order IVPs
outcome.description: Find particular solutions for constant-coefficient linear non-homogeneous first-order IVPs.

outcome.title: Constant-Coefficient Linear Homogeneous Higher-Order ODEs
outcome.description: Find general solutions for constant-coefficient linear homogeneous higher-order ODEs.

outcome.title: Constant-Coefficient Linear Homogeneous Second-Order IVPs
outcome.description: Find particular solutions for constant-coefficient linear homogeneous second-order ODEs.

outcome.title: Constant-Coefficient Linear Non-Homogeneous Second-Order IVPs
outcome.description: Find particular solutions for constant-coefficient linear homogeneous second-order ODEs.

outcome.title: Autonomous Linear First-Order IVP Systems
outcome.description: Find particular solutions for autonomous linear first-order IVP systems.

outcome.title: Discontinuous Functions and Distributions
outcome.description: Illustrate and compute integrals involving the unit step function and Dirac-delta distribution.

outcome.title: Laplace Transforms from Definition and Formulas
outcome.description: Use a table of transforms to find Laplace transformations, and verify a given Laplace transformation from its integral definition.

outcome.title: Inverse Laplace Transforms and Convolution
outcome.description: Compute inverse Laplace transforms using the convolution theorem.

outcome.title: Using Laplace Transforms to Solve IVPs
outcome.description: Solve a second-order constant-coefficient linear IVP involving a discontinuous function by applying Laplace transforms.

outcome.title: Linear Homogeneous First-Order IVPs
outcome.description: Find particular solutions for constant-coefficient linear homogeneous first-order IVPs.

outcome.title: Linear Non-Homogeneous First-Order IVPs
outcome.description: Find particular solutions for constant-coefficient linear non-homogeneous first-order IVPs.

outcome.title: Substitution for First-Order IVPs
outcome.description: Find particular solutions for constant-coefficient linear non-homogeneous first-order IVPs.

outcome.title: Exact First-Order IVPs
outcome.description: Identify exact ODEs, and find their implicit solutions.

outcome.title: Strategies for Solving IVPs
outcome.description: Identify appropriate techniques for solving IVPs based on their structure.
